  • Constructor Details

    • Edge

      public Edge(Node inFrom, Node inTo)
      Pass two nodes at either end of the edge. It creates an edge between the two nodes and maintains the redundant data structures.

    • getOppositeEnd

      public Node getOppositeEnd(Node n)
      Gives the other end of the edge to the argument node
      Returns:
      the node at the other end of the edge, or null if the passed node is not connected to the edge
